PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To investigate the morphology of the polymer / PCBM blend film , atomic force microscopy ( AFM ) was performed , and the result is shown in Figure 6.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| atomic force microscopy ( AFM ) |
| Figure 6 |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions two property values: "atomic force microscopy (AFM)" and "Figure 6." These are the two entities that can be identified as property values in the given paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| atomic force microscopy (AFM) |

Explanation:

After re-evaluating the paragraph, only one property value can be identified as referring to a material property. "Atomic force microscopy (AFM)" is a technique used to investigate the morphology of materials, and thus it can be considered a property value. "Figure 6" is not a material property value, so it has been removed from the table.
